column1: Piraí do Sul is a  municipality in the state of Paraná in the Southern Region of Brazil.The agriculture
column2: production and industrialization of wood are the main sources of economy of Piraí do Sul with high industrial rate: 177 companies operate in town. Agrocultural production is also an important sector
column4: soybeans and wheat. By the end of 2012
column5: total consumption of is 23700 inhabitants should reach BRL 260 million
column6: being the 84th in the state ranking. Piraí do Sul also has tourism potential
column7: especially religious one the city is the fourth destination in the most sought religious tourism in Brasil thanks to the Shrine of Our Lady of the sprout
